items.sentence: Tom is glad the school year is finally over.
Tom is going on a picnic tomorrow with Mary.
Tom is going to be punished for what he did.
Tom starts giggling every time he sees Mary.
Tom thought he heard a mouse in the kitchen.
Tom thought that Mary would like this movie.
Tom told Mary what he really thought of her.
You\'re supposed to know what to do already.
Shouldn\'t you be minding your own business?
I\'m breaking up with my girlfriend tonight.
I\'m fed up with him always preaching to me.
I\'m glad to hear that Tom is out of danger.
I\'m going to Boston next week to visit Tom.
Tom had no idea that Mary wanted to do that.
Tom had no idea what Mary was talking about.
Tom had no recollection of how he got there.
Tom had no way of verifying the information.
Tom had to wait three hours for a tow truck.
Tom doesn\'t want to play the piano anymore.
Tom dyed his hair the same color as Mary\'s.
